creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
org.apache.lenya.cms.cocoon.components.modules.input.WorkflowModule returns
times in 12 hour format. This value is ran through i18n facilities in the footer
of the default publication. Since no AM/PM information is returned, all times
are in the AM. Unkown what other areas this change will affect.

Created attachment 18848
Patch to return time in 24 hour format
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text: Doug Chestnut applied the patch in rev. 442415.
creator: andreas@apache.org
